Package jcurses.widgets

Class TextComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcurses.widgets.Widget
      • jcurses.widgets.TextComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextArea, TextField

    public class TextComponent
extends Widget
    The class is the superclass for text editing widgets

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextComponent

        public TextComponent​(int width,
                     int height,
                     java.lang.String text)
        The constructor
        Parameters:
        width - the preferred width of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container and the text
        height - the preferred height of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container.

      • TextComponent

        public TextComponent​(int width,
                     int height)
        The constructor
        Parameters:
        width - the preferred width of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container and the text
        height - the preferred height of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container and the text.

      • TextComponent

        public TextComponent​()
        Constructor with no arguments. No preferred width and height, empty.

      • TextComponent

        public TextComponent​(java.lang.String text)
        Konstruktor, nur Text, höhe und Breite vom Container bestimmt

        protected int getTextHeight​()

      • getTextWidth

        protected int getTextWidth​()

      • drawAdditionalThings

        protected void drawAdditionalThings​()
        This method draws text-dependent additional things such as scrollbars. As default it makes nothing, can be overriden in inherited classes ( for example text area)

      • refreshAdditionalThings

        protected void refreshAdditionalThings​()
        This method refreshes text-dependent additional after a text change such as scrollbars. As default it makes nothing, can be overriden in inherited classes ( for example text area)

      • getTextRectangle

        protected Rectangle getTextRectangle​()
        The method returns the rectangle, within that the text is painted. Is overrided by derived classes for example to implement a border.

      • getDefaultColors

        public CharColor getDefaultColors​()
        Overrides:
        getDefaultColors in class Widget
        Returns:
        default colors for this widget. What this mentiones in a concret case, is dependent on the derived class.

      • doPaint

        protected void doPaint​()
        Description copied from class: Widget
        This method paints the widget. Will be called by paint(), only if the widget is visible. Must be implemented be derived classes.
        Specified by:
        doPaint in class Widget

      • isFocusable

        protected boolean isFocusable​()
        Description copied from class: Widget
        The method declares, whether the widget can handle input ( get focus ), that is, whether this is an input widget.
        Overrides:
        isFocusable in class Widget
        Returns:
        true, if the widget can handle input, in other case false

      • doRepaint

        protected void doRepaint​()
        Description copied from class: Widget
        This method repaints the widget. Will be called by paint(), only if the widget is visible. Must be implemented be derived classes.
        Specified by:
        doRepaint in class Widget

      • replaceTextLineForPrinting

        protected java.lang.String replaceTextLineForPrinting​(java.lang.String line)
        This method replaces a line of text to printing througth another text line. This can be overrided in derived classes for example for painting all chars as capitals, or for password input. Here the same line is returned.
        Parameters:
        line - a text line to replace, contains no line breaks
        Returns:
        decoded line

      • handleInput

        protected boolean handleInput​(InputChar ch)
        Description copied from class: Widget
        The method is called by framework to let the widget handle an input char. Schould be overrided be derived classes, if these can handle input.
        Overrides:
        handleInput in class Widget
        Returns:
        true, if the widget has handled the char, false in other case

      • focus

        protected void focus​()
        Aus Widget
        Overrides:
        focus in class Widget

      • unfocus

        protected void unfocus​()
        Description copied from class: Widget
        The method is called bei setFocus to tell widget, thas it has lost focus. This method schold be overrided bei derived class to react losing focus, for examlple to repaint widget losing focus.
        Overrides:
        unfocus in class Widget

      • setCursorLocation

        public void setCursorLocation​(int x,
                              int y)
        The method sets the cursor position to given koordinates ( within the text, not widget )
        Parameters:
        x - new x cursor coordinate within the text
        y - new y cursor coordinate within the text
